metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Never Ending Story has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity and Melodic Complexity.
key_conclusion: Never Ending Story has sections analyzed in the following keys: C Major, E♭ Major, G Major,  and B♭ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
